AT.name: SpeedThru: Potzol's Puzzle™
AT.description: Stelle dein schnelles Denken und deine Reflexe in diesem Puzzle-Spiel mit dem besonderen Dreh auf die Probe! Der Gott der Zerstörung namens Kaotl hat das Herz von Creatl, dem Gott der Erschaffung, gestohlen. Du übernimmst die Kontrolle der gleitenden Hüter-Steine. Durch Drehen und richtige Positionierung steuerst du sie durch die Öffnungen in den Wänden, denen du entgegenrast. Sammle die Herzen ein, um Creatl wiederherzustellen. Neben den über 90 Leveln im Ein-Spieler-Modus kannst du außerdem verschiedene Zwei-Spieler-Modi genießen, entweder im Lokalen Modus oder indem du dein Nintendo 3DS-System mit anderen teilst!

AU.name: SpeedThru: Potzol's Puzzle™
AU.description: Put your quick thinking and reactions to the test in this puzzle game with a twist, literally! The god of destruction, Kaotl, has stolen the heart of Creatl, the god of creation. You must take control of the floating Guardian stones, twisting and slotting them through the openings in walls as you hurtle towards them, and collect the hearts to restore Creatl. As well as 90+ stages in single player mode, you can also enjoy two player modes via local wireless or even sharing one Nintendo 3DS system!

BG.name: SpeedThru: Potzol's Puzzle™
BG.description: Put your quick thinking and reactions to the test in this puzzle game with a twist, literally! The god of destruction, Kaotl, has stolen the heart of Creatl, the god of creation. BE.name: SpeedThru: Potzol's Puzzle™
BE.description: Testez votre ingéniosité et vos réflexes dans ce jeu de puzzle révolutionnaire ! Kaotl, le dieu de la destruction, a volé le cœur de Creatl, le dieu de la création. Contrôlez les pierres flottantes gardiennes et faites-les passer à travers les ouvertures dans les murs pour récupérer les cœurs et ressusciter Creatl. Relevez le défi dans plus de 90 stages en mode un joueur, ou bien jouez avec un ami via le mode sans fil local ou sur une seule console Nintendo 3DS !

ES.name: SpeedThru: Potzol's Puzzle™
ES.description: Pon a prueba tu habilidad mental en este juego de puzle que introduce un nuevo giro en el género... ¡literalmente! Kaotl, dios de la destrucción, ha robado el corazón de Creatl, dios de la creación. Tu misión será dirigir las piedras flotantes guardianas, girándolas y colocándolas en las aperturas de las paredes a toda velocidad, ¡a la vez que recoges corazones para salvar a Creatl! ¡SpeedThru incluye más de 90 niveles para un jugador y un modo para dos jugadores utilizando una conexión inalámbrica local o compartiendo una consola Nintendo 3DS!

IT.name: SpeedThru: Potzol's Puzzle™
IT.description: Metti alla prova la tua bravura e i tuoi riflessi in questo rompicapo che ribalterà letteralmente la tua prospettiva! Kaotl, dio della distruzione, ha rubato il cuore di Creatl, dio della creazione. Solo tu puoi riportare l'ordine in questo universo raccogliendo tutti i cuori necessari a riportarlo in vita. Ruota e incastra, all'interno delle fessure sui muri, le pietre guardiane sospese per aria nella tua folle corsa contro il tempo. Divertimento e adrenalina sono garantiti, non solo attraverso più di 90 livelli in modalità ad un giocatore, ma anche sfidando un amico in modalità wireless locale o condividendo una console Nintendo 3DS!

LT.name: SpeedThru: Potzol's Puzzle™

NL.name: SpeedThru: Potzol's Puzzle™
NL.description: Stel je denk-en reactiesnelheid op de proef in dit puzzelspel waarin je letterlijk een draai aan de zaken moet geven! De god der vernietiging, Kaotl, heeft het hart gestolen van Creatl, de god der creatie. Neem controle over de bewakingsstenen, draai en pas ze in de openingen van de muren waar je naartoe raast, en verzamel de harten om Creatl te herstellen. Naast de meer dan 90 levels in de speelstand voor één speler kun je ook met behulp van de lokale draadloze communicatie met z’n tweeën spelen of zelfs één Nintendo 3DS-systeem met anderen delen!

NZ.name: SpeedThru: Potzol's Puzzle™
NZ.description: Put your quick thinking and reactions to the test in this puzzle game with a twist, literally! The god of destruction, Kaotl, has stolen the heart of Creatl, the god of creation. You must take control of the floating Guardian stones, twisting and slotting them through the openings in walls as you hurtle towards them, and collect the hearts to restore Creatl. As well as 90+ stages in single player mode, you can also enjoy two player modes via local wireless or even sharing one Nintendo 3DS system!

PL.name: SpeedThru: Potzol's Puzzle™
PL.description: Put your quick thinking and reactions to the test in this puzzle game with a twist, literally! The god of destruction, Kaotl, has stolen the heart of Creatl, the god of creation. You must take control of the floating Guardian stones, twisting and slotting them through the openings in walls as you hurtle towards them, and collect the hearts to restore Creatl. As well as 90+ stages in single player mode, you can also enjoy two player modes via local wireless or even sharing one Nintendo 3DS system!

PT.name: SpeedThru: Potzol's Puzzle™
PT.description: Põe à prova o teu engenho e os teus reflexos neste jogo de puzzle onde podes girar as peças como nunca antes! O deus da destruição, Kaotl, roubou o coração de Creatl, o deus da criação. Terás de controlar as pedras flutuantes guardiãs, girá-las e encaixá-las nas ranhuras das paredes à medida que vais avançando, enquanto colecionas corações para, assim, restabeleceres Creatl. Para além dos mais de 90 níveis no modo de um jogador, podes também desfrutar do modo de dois jogadores através de uma ligação sem fios local ou partilhando uma consola Nintendo 3DS!

RU.name: SpeedThru: Potzol's Puzzle™
RU.description: SpeedThru – хитро закрученная головоломка в прямом смысле слова: здесь вам понадобится и хорошая реакция, и смекалка. Бог разрушения Kaotl похитил сердце Creatl, бога созидания. Спасти его вам помогут камни-талисманы: их нужно повернуть и расположить так, чтобы они подошли к отверстиям в стенах, которые будут встречаться на вашем пути. Успешно проходя преграды, собирайте сердца, которые помогут вам вернуть Creatl к жизни. В SpeedThru больше 90 уровней для одиночной игры. Кроме того, можно играть вдвоем по локальной беспроводной сети – или даже на одной консоли!

SE.name: SpeedThru: Potzol's Puzzle™
SE.description: Put your quick thinking and reactions to the test in this puzzle game with a twist, literally! The god of destruction, Kaotl, has stolen the heart of Creatl, the god of creation.
